description.value: When the Ship Captain rolls a success on a Will save against a fear effect, they get a critical success instead. In addition, anytime they gain the @Compendium[pf2e.conditionspf2e.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened} condition, reduce its value by 1.

The captain makes two @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.VjxZFuUXrCU94MWR]{Strikes}, one with their @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.tH5GirEy7YB3ZgCk]{Rapier} and one with their @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.iWcw1sFLAzByVLBP]{Main-Gauche} (in either order). If both @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.VjxZFuUXrCU94MWR]{Strikes} hit, the ship captain can attempt to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Dt6B1slsBy8ipJu9]{Disarm} the target. Their multiple attack penalty increases only after all the attacks are made.

The captain orders their shipmates to fight without mercy. All allied creatures of equal or lower level within 20 feet of the ship captain gain a+1 status bonus to attack rolls and damage rolls until the end of the ship captain’s next turn.
This small, bladed weapon is held in one hand and used to stab a creature in close combat. It can also be thrown.
description.label: Description

description.value: Sometimes referred to as an alley bow by rogues or ruffians, this small crossbow fires small bolts that are sometimes used to deliver poison to the target. It’s small enough to be shot one-handed, but it still requires two hands to load.
description.label: Description

description.value: Shorter than traditional arrows but similar in construction, bolts are the ammunition used by crossbows.
description.label: Description

description.value: The thick second skin of the armor disperses blunt force to reduce bludgeoning damage. You gain resistance to bludgeoning damage equal to 1 + the value of the armor’s potency rune for medium armor, or 2 + the value of the armor’s potency rune for heavy armor.
description.label: Description

description.value: The rapier is a long and thin piercing blade with a basket hilt. It is prized among many as a dueling weapon.
description.label: Description
